bibl.title: Boats and Skippers in the Service of Apollonios the Dioiketes especially in Zenon's Alexandrian years (261-256 BC).
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: 1. The stolarch and some other of Apollonios' agents. - 2. Naukleroi. - 3. Captains (kybernetai) and shipowners. - 4. Sailors (nautai or nautikoi). - 5. Some conclusions.
bibl.seg: Hans Hauben, Boats and Skippers in the Service of Apollonios the Dioiketes especially in Zenon's Alexandrian years (261-256 BC).

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume III. Studying Papyri = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 1633-1667.
1. The stolarch and some other of Apollonios' agents. - 2. Naukleroi. - 3. Captains (kybernetai) and shipowners. - 4. Sailors (nautai or nautikoi). - 5. Some conclusions.
